title: That sion nerf >:(

embed.description: This is a WORK IN PROGRESS POST - Patch out but the PBE still down. ] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers! Manage your expectations accordingly.

body:
Sion

        Decimating Smash [Q] - Mana cost now 40/45/50/55/60 (down from 45/50/55/60/65)
        Soul Furnace [W] - Mana cost now 60/65/70/75/80 (down from 65/70/75/80/85)
        Roar of the Slayer [E] - Mana cost now 35/40/45/50/55 (up from 35 at all ranks)

replies.body: He was having successes. It was bound to happen. We wouldn't want characters with unlimited low cost poke in any lane but mid. The compensation is bullshit too. 5 mana off his already costly skill shot spells, while adding mana costs that scale to his only effective laning tool.
